name: Hackintosh
subtitle: Your favourites HackOS in one place
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my, up to date, Apps. Feel free to download. A special thanks to Irene for helping me out with the testing!

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.

apps.name: Spotify
apps.subtitle: Spotify Premium for Free
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify view and add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This lets Spotify add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify access calendars you may have shared with your contacts.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.

apps.name: CarTube
apps.localizedDescription: YouTube for CarPlay, without a jailbreak. Features include no ads, skip sponsored segments via SponsorBlock, some system integrations, etc

apps.name: StravaPremium
apps.localizedDescription: App that transforms fitness tracking into a social hub, enabling you to record activities, discover routes, build community support, train smarter, ensure safety, sync devices, join challenges, and share real efforts all in one place.

apps.name: MyFitnessPalPremium
apps.localizedDescription: Monitor your journey towards achieving your nutritional, hydration, fitness, and weight loss objectives with MyFitnessPal. This comprehensive health and food tracking application serves as your personal nutritionist, meal strategist, and food journal, available to you whenever you need it.

apps.name: YukaPremium
apps.localizedDescription: App that lets you scan the barcodes of food and personal care items to instantly learn about their health impacts. It provides a rating and detailed information for a thorough analysis of each product.

news.title: Eevee Spotify v.6.1.5 Update
news.caption: The new update fully fixes the Random order song playing bug ✅

news.title: uYouPlus
news.caption: Still present the Shorts bug that causes the app to crash 🅧

news.title: ▶️ YouTube Lite ▶️
news.caption: YouTube Lite is an enhanced version of YouTube classic. No Shorts Bug ✅
